short.ar: مع مكعب الهندسة لطيف ، تجنب الأشواك على منصة خطيرة والحصول على الدرجات.
short.am: የሚያምር ጂኦሜትሪ ክዩብ ጋር, አደገኛ መድረክ ላይ እሾህ አስወግድ እና ውጤት ያግኙ.
short.bg: Със сладкия куб геометрия избягвайте тръните на опасна платформа и получете резултати.
short.bn: চতুর জ্যামিতি কিউব দিয়ে, একটি বিপজ্জনক প্ল্যাটফর্মের কাঁটাগুলি এড়িয়ে চলুন এবং স্কোর পান।
short.ca: Amb el bonic cub de geometria, eviteu les espines d'una plataforma perillosa i obteniu puntuacions.
short.cs: S roztomilou geometrickou kostkou se vyhněte trním na nebezpečné plošině a získejte skóre.
short.da: Med den søde geometriterning skal du undgå tornene på en farlig platform og få scoringer.
short.de: Vermeiden Sie mit dem niedlichen Geometriewürfel die Dornen auf einer gefährlichen Plattform und erhalten Sie Punkte.
short.el: Με τον χαριτωμένο κύβο γεωμετρίας, αποφύγετε τα αγκάθια σε μια επικίνδυνη πλατφόρμα και λάβετε βαθμολογίες.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,lt,pt_BR,pt_: With the cute geometry cube, avoid the thorns on a dangerous platform and get scores.
short.es: Con el lindo cubo de geometría, evita las espinas en una plataforma peligrosa y obtén puntuaciones.
short.et: Armsa geomeetriakuubikuga vältige okkaid ohtlikul platvormil ja saate hindeid.
short.fa: با مکعب هندسه ناز، اجتناب از خار در پلت فرم خطرناک و گرفتن نمرات.
short.fi: Vältä söpöllä geometriakuutiolla piikkejä vaarallisella alustalla ja saat pisteitä.
short.fil: Gamit ang cute geometry cube, maiwasan ang mga thorns sa isang mapanganib na platform at makakuha ng mga puntos.
short.fr: Avec le joli cube de géométrie, évitez les épines sur une plate-forme dangereuse et obtenez des scores.
short.gu: સુંદર ભૂમિતિ ઘન સાથે, જોખમી પ્લેટફોર્મ પર કાંટાને ટાળો અને સ્કોર્સ મેળવો.
short.he: עם קוביית הגיאומטריה החמודה, הימנעו מהקוצים על פלטפורמה מסוכנת וקבלו ציונים.
short.hi: प्यारा ज्यामिति घन के साथ, एक खतरनाक मंच पर कांटों से बचें और स्कोर प्राप्त करें।
short.hr: Uz slatku geometrijsku kocku izbjegavajte trnje na opasnoj platformi i dobijte rezultate.
short.hu: Az aranyos geometriakockával kerülje a töviseket egy veszélyes platformon, és szerezzen pontszámokat.
short.id: Dengan kubus geometri yang lucu, hindari duri pada platform berbahaya dan dapatkan skor.
short.it: Con il simpatico cubo geometrico, evita le spine su una piattaforma pericolosa e ottieni punteggi.
short.ja: かわいいジオメトリキューブで、危険なプラットフォーム上のとげを避け、スコアを取得します。
short.kn: ಮುದ್ದಾದ ಜ್ಯಾಮಿತಿ ಘನದೊಂದಿಗೆ, ಅಪಾಯಕಾರಿ ಪ್ಲಾಟ್ ಫಾರ್ಮ್ ನಲ್ಲಿರುವ ಮುಳ್ಳುಗಳನ್ನು ತಪ್ಪಿಸಿ ಮತ್ತು ಸ್ಕೋರ್ ಗಳನ್ನು ಪಡೆಯಿರಿ.
short.ko: 귀여운 지오메트리 큐브를 사용하면 위험한 플랫폼에서 가시를 피하고 점수를 얻으십시오.
short.lv: Izmantojot jauko ģeometrijas kubu, izvairieties no ērkšķiem uz bīstamas platformas un iegūstiet punktus.
short.ml: മനോഹരമായ ജ്യാമിതി ക്യൂബ് ഉപയോഗിച്ച്, അപകടകരമായ പ്ലാറ്റ്ഫോമിലെ മുള്ളുകൾ ഒഴിവാക്കി സ്കോറുകൾ നേടുക.
short.mr: गोंडस भूमिती घनामुळे धोकादायक चबुतऱ्यावरील काटे टाळा आणि गुण मिळवा.
short.ms: Dengan kiub geometri comel, elakkan duri pada platform berbahaya dan dapatkan markah.
short.nl: Met de schattige geometriekubus vermijd je de doornen op een gevaarlijk platform en krijg je scores.
short.no: Med den søte geometrikuben, unngå tornene på en farlig plattform og få score.
short.pl: Dzięki uroczej kostce geometrii unikaj cierni na niebezpiecznej platformie i zdobywaj punkty.
short.ro: Cu cubul de geometrie drăguț, evitați spinii pe o platformă periculoasă și obțineți scoruri.
short.ru: С симпатичным кубиком геометрии избегайте шипов на опасной платформе и получайте очки.
short.sk: S roztomilou kockou geometrie sa vyhnite tŕňom na nebezpečnej plošine a získajte skóre.
short.sl: Z luštno geometrijo kocko, izogibajte trnje na nevarni platformi in dobili rezultate.
short.sv: Med den söta geometrikuben, undvik taggarna på en farlig plattform och få poäng.
short.sw: Pamoja na mche mzuri wa jiometri, epuka miiba kwenye jukwaa hatari na kupata alama.
short.ta: அழகான வடிவியல் கனசதுரத்துடன், ஆபத்தான மேடையில் உள்ள முட்களைத் தவிர்த்து மதிப்பெண்களைப் பெறுங்கள்.
short.te: క్యూట్ జ్యామితి క్యూబ్ తో, ప్రమాదకరమైన ప్లాట్ ఫారం మీద ముళ్లను పరిహరించండి మరియు స్కోర్ లను పొందండి.
short.th: ด้วยลูกบาศก์เรขาคณิตที่น่ารักหลีกเลี่ยงหนามบนแพลตฟอร์มที่อันตรายและรับคะแนน
short.tr: Sevimli geometri küpü ile tehlikeli bir platformda dikenlerden kaçının ve puan alın.
short.uk: З милим кубиком геометрії уникайте шипів на небезпечній платформі та отримуйте бали.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
One of the most striking names of the last period among platform games is the Geometry Rash game. As the name suggests, this game, inspired by the popular Geometry Dash game, appeals to adults and children.

In this adventure with our cute cube character, we aim to overcome the obstacles on the platform and score the highest. But remember, this game is not an ordinary running game. As your score increases, the speed of the game increases. Yes, you heard right! The number of obstacles you encounter increases with your rate in the game. But among the challenges, there are rewards to motivate you: bright stars!

Of course, there is a purpose for you to collect these stars. By collecting leads, you can give your character new looks. This means that our cube character runs and jumps and offers us opportunities for different jump game experiences. Who wouldn't want your character to have a different look on the platform? Each star helps your character get a new look.

For those looking for a game like Geo Dash, Geometry Rash is a brand new breath in the game world. It will become an indispensable game for children and adults with its graphics, sound effects, and user-friendly interface.

If you are into platform games and are looking for a new gaming experience, Geometry Rash may be for you. This platform game, where you can find the challenges and fun offered by the game, promises to give you hours of fun. Test your jumping skills and get new looks by collecting stars with your cute cube character.

How To Play
It is played with the mouse.

Geometry Rash Action Game Features
✓ 5+ Level
✓ Easy use control
✓ Cartoon Graphics
✓ Quality Character Skin

Finally, you can enjoy these game for free (and more requests will be added)! Geometry Rash Action Game extension does not contain any hidden ads. In this way, you can fully experience the game and have a pleasant time. This game with great graphics has been designed for you with every detail in mind.

Help and Contact
Contact with us at info@pickergame.com and share your thoughts and problems.
